43666.ドルワーム王国の出入り口付近に行く\n昇降用 神カラクリがある。\nスイッチを押:
There is a Divine Elevator Machine that goes to
Dolworm Kingdom's entrance, press switch to move?<yesno><close>

43667.ドルワーム王国の城下町に行く\n昇降用 神カラクリがある。\nスイッチを押して:
There is a Divine Elevator Machine that goes to
Dolworm Kingdom's castle town, press switch to move?<yesno><close>

208220.この神カラクリからは いくつかの場所に\n移動できそうだ。\nどこへ 移動します:
From this Divine Machine, it looks
like we can go to several places.
Where would you like to go?
<select>
In front of Crystal Palace
In front of Gold Bank
In front of Armorsmith Guild
In front of Tavern
In front of Post Office
<select_end><close>

10306000.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「おひさまのぬ:
I would like to make a letter board overflowing with Warmth of the Sun. Dolworm Kingdom is the land of the
sun. We need to have a sun-like atmosphere in order to call ourselves the local letterhead of this country.

40847.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ウフフ……。ウ:
Hmmm... Isn't this house spacious? Our ancestors built this house to show off and it's the best house in Dolworm.
Thanks to that, we're making no money, but we're constantly getting taxed and our finances are on fire. I'm so
sorry.

40848.「はいはい どうも どうも。\n 偉大なる建築家 ドン・パパチョといえば\n ワ:
Yes, yes, yes, yes. I'm Don Papacho, the great architect, and by that I mean me. So, you're here for a job?
Oh, no, no. Then I have no use for you. Then I'll let you go.

49727.「ん？ 名門建築家のドン家だって？\n そういや すぐ後ろの民家に ドンなんとか:
Hmm? The Don family, the famous architects? Well, I think there's a guy named Don something living in the
house right behind us.

40849.「昔 ツスクルの村の地下には\n 迷宮が 広がっていたらしいね。\n その奥に:
It is said that there used to be a labyrinth under Tsusukul Village. It seems that God's Hall was located in
the back of the labyrinth. The entrance to the labyrinth is now left in a room of the staff dormitory
called Sakura-no-Ma.

40850.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「古い建物には:
Old buildings are imbued with the history of the people who have lived in them. That's why I love old
buildings. I specialize in repairs and demolition. This is also a bad business, though.

198996.「しばらく ここを はなれとったが\n やはり 故郷の町は いいもんじゃのう。\:
I've been away from here for a while, but I still like my home town. I like to hear the idle rumors whispered
among the townspeople. I'm going to go back to collecting rumors again.

33642.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「ここは 国王:
This is the King's venerable palace. I'm sorry, but we can't let anyone in right now. The Royal Academy is
preparing for an important experiment. Normally, as long as you have Proof of Adulthood, we'd let someone like you
in. If you want to go in, you'll have to find somewhere to kill time until the preparations are complete. You
might want to tour some other countries as well.

33643.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「一人前の証を:
You are like a wily adventurer with Proof of Adulthood. Preparations for the experiment by the Royal Academy of
Sciences are finally complete. Please, come on through.

33644.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「心なしか 水晶:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>Somehow, I feel as if the dazzling
glow of the Crystal Palace is fading.
Is it an optical illusion?

33645.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「王立騎士団の団長:
Prince Ramiza, the leader of the Royal Knights, is a weakling, a crybaby, and a hopeless screw-up. I came from Mount
Gatara to join the Royal Knights. But hearing that, I lost my motivation.

33646.「ここは 国王のおわす 由緒正しき宮殿。:
This is the venerable palace of the
king.

33647.「今 城内では 大事な実験の 準備中。\n どのような方でも\n 通すわけには:
We are preparing for an important
experiment in the castle. We cannot
let anyone pass.

33649.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「ここは 国王:
This is the King's venerable palace. I'm sorry, but we can't let anyone in right now. The Royal Academy is
preparing for an important experiment. Normally, we'd let someone like you in as long as you have Proof of
Adulthood. If you want to go in, you'll have to kill time somewhere until they're done. Maybe take a look
around in another country.

33650.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「王立研究院に:
Preparations for the experiment by the Royal Academy of Sciences are finally underway. Hmm. You have Proof of
Adulthood. I will allow you to visit the castle. But Dolworm Crystal Palace is a big place. Be sure not to get
lost.

33651.「ドルワーム王国は 神カラクリや\n 太陽の石など 高度な文明を持ち\n 世界的:
The Dolworm Kingdom has an advanced civilization with the Divine Machine and the Solar Stone, which are highly
acclaimed around the world. But none of these things were created by us modern Dwarfs. Yes, they are. These
are the legacies of the ancient Dwarfs. We should be grateful to our great ancestors.

33652.「わしは 行商をしながら 訪れた土地の\n 昔話やら 伝説やらを集めておるんじゃ:
As a peddler, I collect folk tales and legends of the lands I visit. There is a legend that the Dolworm Kingdom was
nearly destroyed by the monster Kukulkannibal a long time ago. It is said that at that time, the body and
soul of the monster were separated and sealed separately using the technology of an ancient civilization. Well, even
if it is a myth, it is an interesting idea.

33653.「あら。おかえり～。\n やっと 帰ってきたの……:
Oh, hey. Welcome home. I'm finally
home.

33654.<turn_pc>「って やだぁ！\n うちの息子と カンちがいしちゃった。\n:
<turn_pc>Oh, no! I thought you were my son. I'm
sorry.

33655.<turn_pc>「うちの息子ったら 一度 遊びにいくと\n いつまで経っても:
<turn_pc>My son, once he goes out to play, he
never comes back no matter how long it
takes. It's really annoying!

33656.<turn_pc>「母ひとり 子ひとりの生活だけど\n つつがなく 暮らさせても:
I live alone as a mother and a child, but I am able to live comfortably. Dolworm is a really nice country. I am
grateful to Mr. King Woolard for his courageous decision to leave Dolworm.

33657.<icon_exc>「あっ いや なんでもないんだよ！\n 今のは 忘れておくれ:
<icon_exc>Oh, no, it's nothing! Forget about
that. Ha-ha-ha.

33658.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr><turn_pc:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr><turn_pc>I live alone as a mother and a child,
but I am able to live comfortably.
Dolworm is a really nice country.

33659.「私は この地で起きた あらゆる出来事を\n 歌にして 後世に伝えていく者です。:
I am the one who sings songs about all the events that took place in this land and pass them on to future
generations. At the moment, I am writing a song about an event that happened to the Dolworm royal family.
Please look forward to its completion.

33660.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「この 昇降用:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>This Divine Machine can lift and lower you into
and out from Castle Town. Please press the switch.

33661.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「この 昇降用:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>This Divine Machine can lift and lower you into
and out from Castle Town. Please press the switch.

33662.「この国を守る 王立騎士団をご存知？\n 私のダーリンは そこにつとめていて\n:
Have you ever heard of the Royal Guard? My darling works there and is in charge of protecting the Knight
Commander, Prince Ramiza. It's a cool and prestigious job, but I'm worried every day if he'll come back
safely without getting hurt or something.

33663.「この国を代表する 天才学者\n ドゥラ院長の研究成果を見るため\n ドルワーム:
I made my way to Dolworm to see the work of one of the country's leading geniuses, Director Dura, whose work
will soon be published. I hear that his research, which will be published soon, could save this country.

33664.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「あ～あ。カノジョが:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Ah~ ah. I wish I had a girlfriend. I'm
tired of killing time alone like this.

33665.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「風のウワサで:
I heard from a rumor that there is a woman who, as soon as she sees a person's face, forces him or her to
become her servant! I heard that there is an unbelievable woman who forces you to be her servant as soon as she
sees your face. She must be a big macho woman with a face like a troll. Oh, scared, scared.

33666.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「広大なるゴブル:
Great job crossing the vast Goble Desert to get here. Welcome to Dolworm Kingdom, the desert paradise that all adventures are said to admire.
Many are flocking to the Dolworm Crystal Palace for a major announcement by the President of the Royal Academy of Sciences in the near future. If you have Proof of Adulthood, you may wish to visit the Dolworm Crystal Palace and pay him a visit. However, the Crystal Palace is very hectic at the moment. Ask one of the guards if you can come in.

33667.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「あなたも ゴブ:
You crossed the Goble Desert and came here too? It must have been a tough trip for you, wasn't it? For Weddie,
traveling across the desert is a real risk of life.

33668.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「おう！ どうし:
Oh! What's the matter, young man? If you're not too busy, the Armorsmith Guild behind you could use a good
sweat! We've got armor, shields, armors, you name it! If you want to make your own armor, come on in to the
Armorsmith Guild!

33669.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「あら あなた:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Oh, honey. You're not from Dolworm,
are you?<yesno><break>

33670.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「あら そう？\:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>Oh, really? You don't have that urban
aura about you that I do.

33671.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「ふふん。やっ:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Hmmm. As I thought. I couldn't feel
your urban aura like mine.

33672.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「さっき 人間の:
I saw a HUMAN woman a while ago. She was far away, so I couldn't see her clearly, but she seemed to have a very
urban sense of style. I always admire that kind of slender style. I wish I could have been born a human, too.

33673.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「たいくつだなぁ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>I'm bored. I'm tired of playing the
same games all the time.

61684.「ねぇねぇ！\n なにか あたらしい遊びを しらない？:
Hey, hey! Do you want to play
something different?

33674.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「この階段を上が:
Up these stairs is the Dolworm Crystal Palace. Inside is the Royal Research Institute, where researchers like
myself work day and night in pursuit of knowledge. If you have a Proof of Adulthood, you are free to visit!
However, we are currently preparing for an important experiment, and outsiders are not allowed to enter
until the preparations are complete. Please ask the guards at the entrance of the Crystal Palace if you can
enter.

33675.「見てくれよ。\n あの きらびやかに そびえたつ宮殿を！\n なんとも 壮観じ:
Look at it! Look at that palace,
soaring in all its splendor! It's
quite a spectacle, isn't it?

33676.<turn_pc>「あそこに見える建物は ドルワーム水晶宮。\n ウラード国王様:
The building over there is Dolworm Crystal Palace. It is the palace of Dolworm Kingdom, where King Woolard
resides. It was built thousands of years ago, but it still retains its beauty.

33677.<turn_pc>「あそこに見える建物は ドルワーム水晶宮。\n ウラード国王様:
The building over there is Dolworm Crystal Palace. It is the palace of Dolworm Kingdom, where King Woolard
resides. It was built thousands of years ago, but it still retains its beauty.

33678.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「神カラクリで:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>It looks like you came down with the
Divine Machine. Do you know what
powers it?<yesno><break>

33679.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「あれはな 太:
It is powered by the energy of a mysterious gemstone called the Sun Stone. Not only the Divine Machine for
lifting and lowering, but also the lights of the city, the sand ejector, and so on, are all powered by the
power of the Sun Stone. That's right. The Sun Stone is a treasure of this country that is indispensable to our
lives.

33680.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「おお そうか。:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Oh, I see. You're a diligent student,
aren't you? You should join the Royal
Academy and become a scholar.

33681.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「一人前の証を:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>You sound like an uderly adventurer
with Proof of Adulthood. Please come
on through.

33682.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「一人前の証は:
You have Proof of Adulthood. Then I will allow you to visit the castle. But Dolworm Crystal Palace is a big
place. Be sure not to get lost.

33683.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「この国を代表する天:
I came to Dolworm because I heard that the research of Director Dura, one of the country's leading geniuses, was
going to be showcased. But it seems that his research results have already been published. I'm sorry I missed it.

33684.「まあ あなたも 魔瘴石を求め\n 東のカルサドラ火山へ？\n あんな危険な所ま:
Well, you also went east to Calsadora Volcano in search of demon miasma stones? Thank you for going to such a
dangerous place. The biggest mountain in front of you is Calsadora Volcano. Please use it as a landmark as you
continue through the desert.

33685.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「あら さっきの:
Oh, hey, the pretty lady from earlier! What? Why? Why is it that you, who has no urban aura, are getting along
better with her than I, who exudes an urban aura~!

33686.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「ドゥラ院長から:
As Director Dura mentioned, the Royal Research Institute is currently in search of many demon miasma stones!
Those of you who have the skills have all headed east to Calsadora Volcano, where the demon miasma stones can be
found! Rewards are being prepared according to the size of the demon miasma stones brought, so please help
us out!

33687.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「なんだ なんだ:
What is it? The people who were downstairs started running outside at a great speed while shouting ''Masho
Seki, Masho Seki''. It looks like they all ran in the direction of Calsadora Volcano to the east.

33688.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「ときに お前:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Do you know what powers the Divine
Machine?<yesno><break>

33689.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「あれはな 太陽:
It is powered by the energy of a mysterious gemstone called the Sun Stone. Not only the Divine Machine for
lifting and lowering, but also the lights of the city and the sand outflow system, are all powered by the
power of the Sun Stone. That's right. The Sun Stone is a treasure of this country that is indispensable to our
lives.

33690.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「おお そうか。:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Oh, I see. You're a diligent student,
aren't you? You should join the Royal
Academy and become a scholar.

33691.「私は この地で起きた あらゆる出来事を\n 歌にし 後世に伝えていく者です。\:
I am the one who writes songs about everything that happens in this land and passes them on to future
generations. I have just finished a song about the twins of the Dolworm royal family. It's a bit long, but
would you like to hear it?

33692.「そうですか。気が向いたら\n いつでも 声をかけてください。:
I see. Whenever you feel like it, just
give me a call.

33693.「それでは 吟じますね……。\n<br>\n「ラララ 遠い昔の物語～♪\n 王家:
I will now recite. La la la la, a story from a long time ago... twins born into a royal family. They fought
for the throne and destroyed the country. Time flies, and history goes round and round... another twin of
misfortune is born. The doomed twins with the three stars in their hands. Even so, my sweet child~ Who can let
go of this child~ Who can blame her? Choose your country or choose your own child~ On a starry night, Lulalulu~~~
it's a terrible thing to have to abandon one's own child even to protect one's country, isn't it?

33694.「どうやら ドゥラ院長の研究は\n 悪しきチカラを持つ魔瘴石を\n 太陽の石に:
Apparently, Director Dura's research was to turn the evil demon miasma stone into a solar stone. If such a
thing could really be done, his name would be permanently etched in the history of the Dolworm.

33695.「あの フミイミという詩人さんの歌……。\n あれは 今のドルワーム王家の悲劇を:
The song by the poet Fumiimi. It describes the tragedy of the Dolworm royal family. In this country, when a
twin is born into the royal family, it is customary for one half of the twin to be abandoned to avoid conflict.
Yes, that's right. King Woolard, who had twins, also abandoned one of them according to the custom. Prince Ramiza
had his own brothers.

33696.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「皆さんが協力し:
Thanks to everyone's help, we have collected a lot of demon miasma stones. The ceremony to convert the
demon miasma stones collected in the throne room into sun stones should be starting soon. Please hurry to the
throne room!

33697.「マショーセキ マショーセキって叫びながら\n 外に飛びだしていった人たちが\n:
Some people came outta nowhere with a black stone wrapped in cloth, shouting 'Devil Stone, Devil Stone'.
Oh yeah? It looks like you have one too, but it's remarkably small, isn't it. Smallest one I've seen, at least.
...Ah, it looks like everyone who came back went to the Crystal Palace. Maybe you should go there too, shouldn't you?

33698.「みんなが 持ちかえった黒い石を\n あんたも持っているみたいだけど……。\n:
You seem to have one of those black rocks that everyone else brought back. That's the smallest one I've ever
seen. Yeah, it looks like everyone who came back went to the Crystal Palace. Maybe you should go there too.

33699.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「マショーセキ:
Some people ran outside shouting ''Masoseki, Masoseki, Masoseki'' and brought back a black stone wrapped in
a cloth. And they all took the black stone to the Crystal Palace, but I wonder if there is anything in it.

33700.「水晶宮の 玉座の間がある辺りで\n 大きな火花が 見えたんじゃ。\n<br>\:
I saw a big spark in the area where the throne room is located in the Crystal Palace. That's no optical
illusion. I have a bad feeling about this.

33701.「王立騎士団の団長 ラミザ王子は\n 弱虫 泣き虫 いくじなしと三拍子そろった\:
Prince Ramiza, the leader of the Royal Knights, is a weakling, a crybaby, and a hopeless screw-up. And now there's a
very smart guy claiming to be the prince's twin brother. This is going to cause a stir.

33702.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ウラード国王様が:
I heard that one half of the twins that King Woolard tearfully gave up in order not to spark a conflict has
turned up. If a power struggle breaks out like this, I feel sorry for the king who made this decision out of
concern for his people.

33703.「魔瘴石を 太陽の石に変えるという\n ドゥラ院長の研究は どうやら\n 失敗し:
It seems that Director Dura's research to change the demon miasma stone into a sun stone has failed. After all, it
is impossible for an ungodly person to change the cause and effect of things.

33704.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「こないだ 水晶:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>The other day I was passing by the
Crystal Palace and passed by a
beautiful woman. Do you know Lunana?<yesno><break>

33705.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「そうかー。あん:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I see. It's like losing half of your
life not knowing a beautiful woman
like that.

33706.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「なにーっ！ あ:
What! You're Lunana's servant? I'd be happy to be pushed around by that Lunana-san with my chin! I envy you,
my servant.

33707.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「私 聞いてしま:
I heard all about it! Somehow the legendary monster, the Demon Kukulkannibal, was resurrected in the throne room!
Traveler, are you perhaps thinking of following Kukulkannibal from here?

33708.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「いいえ 私には:
I don't get it at all. You're burning with justice, who else is gonna quickly try taking down Kukulkannibal!
Kukulkannibal was headed for Boronus Hole, southwest from here and at the western edge of Goble Desert West at Boronus Lava Flow.
To enter Boronus Lava Flow, follow the road until you see a strange cave, and please get the bottom of it. Good luck!

33709.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「天魔クァバルナ:
Boronus Hole, where Kukulkannibal was headed, is located in Boronus Lava Flow, just west of Goble Desert West,
which is southwest of here. Enter Boronus Lava Flow and follow the road until you see a cave with a strange
hole in it. Good luck!

33710.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「なによ！ あの:
What? That Lunana woman! When I approached her, she suddenly slapped me and said, ''Get out of the street!
She slapped me out of the blue. She may look pretty on the outside, but she's got a heart of gold! She made me
feel like a fool.

33711.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「聞きましたよっ！\:
I heard it! I heard that Kukulkannibal, who was sealed in the demon miasma stone, has been
resurrected in the throne room! According to an ancient document, Kwaba Luna once sent the Dwachakka
Continent into the depths of terror! There is no way Prince Ramiza can defeat such a monster and return
safely! Ahhh, someone please help me!

33712.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「水晶宮に 黒い:
The guys who carried the black stone to the Crystal Palace left as if they were trying to escape! Something bad
is happening!

33713.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「まあ！ ドル:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Well! Isn't he the hero of Dolworm
<pc>? Please, come on
through.

33714.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「玉座の間に現れた魔:
The monster that appeared in the throne room has been vanquished, but the crystal palace's haze remains a
smokescreen. I wish it were an optical illusion.

33715.「滅亡の危機にさらされていた ドルワームを\n 行きずりの旅人が 救ってくれたそ:
Dolworm was in danger of extinction when a wayward traveler saved it. I am glad that this country, bequeathed by
our ancestors, did not perish in our generation. We are grateful to the great traveler.

33716.「魔物の討伐のため 王立騎士団の人が\n かりだされたみたいだけど\n 私のダー:
It seems that the Royal Guard was called out to help defeat the monster, but my darling is safe. I was so
worried about him this time because he's supposed to protect Prince Ramiza.

33717.「ドゥラ院長の失策により 水晶宮に現れた\n 天魔クァバルナという魔物は\n 勇:
Due to Director Dura's blunder, a monster named Kukulkannibal appeared in the Crystal Palace and was defeated
by a courageous traveler. The traveler will be presented with a symbol of honor and merit.

33718.「天魔クァバルナの討伐に向かった\n ドゥラ院長と ラミザ王子が\n 先ほど 無:
Director Dura and Prince Ramiza, who went to defeat Kukulkannibal, returned safely a few days ago. Prince Ramiza
seemed to be a bit nervous about Director Dura, but both of them went to the Crystal Palace.

33719.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ややっ <pc:
Oh no, it's , isn't it? I heard that they defeated Quaba Luna on behalf of the Royal Knights! Prince
Ramiza and the others went to see the king to report it! Now you are in the throne room!

33720.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「あんたは もし:
Are you by any chance? I've heard rumors about you. I heard that you defeated a legendary monster
that could destroy Dolworm! That's a big deal. I bet if you report this to King Woolard, he'll give you a great
reward!

33721.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「あんたのウワサ:
I've heard rumors about you. I heard you defeated a monster that could have destroyed Dolworm. That's a big deal.
I bet if we report this to King Woolard, he'll give us a big reward!

33722.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「心なしか 水晶:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>The crystal palace seems to glow
brighter than before. Is this also an
optical illusion? Hmmm....

33723.「ラミザ王子の 双子の弟と名乗る人物は\n ニセモノだったようだ。\n<br>\:
It seems that the person claiming to be Prince Ramiza's twin brother is a fake. But because of that, it seems
that the prince has changed his mind, and I might join the Royal Knights.

33724.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「クァバルナを:

Hero of Dolworm!

33725.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「やあ ドルワ:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Hello Dolworm heroes <pc>.

33726.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ドゥラ院長が:
It seems that the Director was mistaken about Director Dura being Prince Ramiza's brother. And now the
real princess has appeared! I'm really glad that there was no conflict. Our lives are the same as before, and I'm

33727.「私は この地で起きた あらゆる出来事を\n 歌にし 後世に伝えていく者です。\:
I am the one who will write songs about all the events that took place here and pass them on to future
generations. Now a new history has been made in Dolworm Kingdom. I have written a song about it. Would you
like to hear it?

33728.「そうですか。気が向いたら\n いつでも 声をかけてください。:
I see. Whenever you feel like it, just
give me a call.

33729.<if_woman>「それでは 吟じますね……。\n<br>\n「ラララ とある:
I will now recite. La la la la, the story of a woman... a traveler who appeared with a sandstorm... Her name
is ~. Oh, the woman with the courage that surges through her. Who can overcome her? Who can overcome
her? Ah, Wanderer. Without a word, he leaves with a sandstorm~ Into the wilderness of battle Lulalulu~I will now recite. La la la la, the story of a man... a traveler who appeared with a sandstorm. His name is
~. Oh, the man with the courage that surges through him. Who can surpass him? Who can overcome him?
Ah, Wanderer. He leaves with a storm of sand without a word Into the wilderness of battle.

33730.「私のダーリンは 王立騎士団で\n ラミザ王子を お守りしている騎士サマなの。\:
My darling is a knight who protects
Prince Ramiza in the Royal Guard. I
can't wait for him to come back.

33731.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「まあっ あなた:
Is that not the Gold Key Emblem you are holding in your hand? So you are the Hero of Dolworm . We

33733.「これは これは <pc>様。\n ようこそ 砂漠の楽園 ドルワームへ。\n ど:

33734.「じつは 私 はるか西のウェナ諸島にある\n ヴェリナード王国の調査員でして。\:
I am actually a researcher for the Verinard Kingdom in the far western Wena Islands. I was on a visit to the
Royal Research Institute. I have to go home soon, but I'm at a loss because I spent the money for the return ticket
on food and drink.

33735.「私 スラっとした 黒カミ美人の\n ルナナって人に あこがれてたんだけど\n:
I had a crush on a slender, black- haired beauty named Lunana, but she had a terrible personality and was
really insensitive! You saved us. You're much more beautiful! In the end, what's important isn't how you
look.

33737.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「プププ……。\:
Pppp. Come to think of it, the demon miasma stone you brought with you was really modest. I never thought you
would do such a big thing to save the country. In a good way, I was disappointed!

33738.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「やあ <pc>:
Hey . Thanks to you, Dolworm is at peace today. As you can see, Dolworm Crystal Palace is as
beautiful as ever. Ancient technology is really amazing.

33739.「わしは まちがっておった。\n この国を支える 太陽の石こそが\n 国宝だと:
I was wrong. I thought that the sun stone, which sustains this country, was a national treasure. But the
people of the Royal Academy have succeeded in creating a new solar gem. It was not the things that mattered,
but the people who would create the future. They were the true national treasures.

53767.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「ウチのダンナは:
My husband is a bit unreliable and slow, so I've entrusted him with all the housework to make him more of a
man. It's a great role for a wife to train her husband to be a good man, isn't it

53768.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「食事のしたく:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>After I'm done with the meal, next
comes the laundry and the bath. I'm so
busy, so busy, so busy.

61477.「武器鍛冶職人も 悪くないものですが\n 私は 命を守るための物を作ることに\n:
Weaponsmiths are evil Kunai things, but I take great pride in making things that protect lives. Every
minute an Armorsmith works, even if it's just a little bit, saves lives. There is no more rewarding job in the
world.

69393.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「クスッ。いらっ:
C'mon. Welcome. I am Lilim, guildmaster of this Armorsmith Guild. Your name is , right?
That's a pretty sexy name. Armorsmithing is the art of making metal armor, such as armor, armors,
and shields, with your own hands. The armor we make is sold wholesale to the Armor Shop in Astoltia. Yes, this is
truly a front-line facility for saving lives! A good suit of armor is unique to its owner. Why Not be an
Armorsmith? We're kind of on a hiring freeze for new artisans right now. There's a lot of unrest in the world
these days, don't you think? There's been a lot of talk about demon miasma, but the demand for armor has
skyrocketed. I'm sure it's the same in every artisan guild, but we've got our hands full with our regular work. We
don't have time to take care of newcomers. You are welcome to visit the guild and shop in the Recipe Shop
or Material Shop if you like.

43913.「うちのギルドのマスターはなぁ。\n 言うことは ち～っとばかり変わった お方だ:
The master of our guild is a bit of an
oddball. He's a bit eccentric, but
he's a genius, so it can't be helped.

This counter differs from the usual Gold Bank service and its services are only available to special customers.

145224.井戸の中から 悪しきチカラを感じる……。\n<br>\nここに 光導使ミナナを封:
